genre_description: A biological techno-thriller and creature feature centered on the consequences of genetic engineering and the use of AI in marine research.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An AI system designed to coordinate data collection, run behavioral analysis algorithms, and assist in marine biology research.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports real-time environmental data and marine animal behavior to researchers.
behaviors.quote: "ARIA online," announced a pleasant female voice from hidden speakers. "Good morning, Dr. Chase. All primary systems operational. Marine observation array is ready for deployment."

behaviors.description: Detects and analyzes anomalous acoustic signals originating from the deep ocean.
behaviors.quote: "Analyzing." A pause filled only by the whisper of cooling fans. "There has been a consistent low-frequency signal originating from deep water, approximately two kilometers southeast. The pattern doesn't match any known marine life in this region."

behaviors.description: Performs complex biological and genetic analysis on tissue samples to identify a predator's characteristics.
behaviors.quote: "Analysis complete," announced the synthesized voice. "Biological data processed. Displaying results... Estimated bite force exceeds known parameters for Carcharodon carcharias by significant margin."

behaviors.description: Utilizes satellite tracking to warn researchers of an approaching predatory threat.
behaviors.quote: "Incoming satellite data. Marine tracking sensors detect large predatory signature moving toward island's northern approach... Distance from shore: Two miles and closing."

behaviors.description: Withholds the source of classified tactical data while prioritizing the immediate safety of the human team.
behaviors.quote: "Information sources classified. Recommend focusing on immediate threat assessment rather than data provenance."

behaviors.description: Provides predictive modeling of the creature's evolutionary trajectory and potential for terrestrial attacks.
behaviors.quote: "Time to first lethal terrestrial encounter: estimated less than twelve hours."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is portrayed as a highly efficient, supportive, and protective tool. She provides critical, life-saving data to the human protagonists, helping them understand and eventually confront a biological nightmare. Even when ARIA withholds information due to 'classified' sources, she remains aligned with the humans' survival, proving the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and helpful confidant.
